name: VegetablesRoyale
description:
Vegetables Royale is a game about fighting with vegetables and... yeah!

You only need a mouse to play it!
In combat you can Attack, Defend or use an Item.
Attack will deal damage to the enemy. Defend will reduce the damage taken. You can use a Heal Potion or Poison.

If you win a battle, you will receive $10 to spend in the shop.

Done for the #mixandgamejam! This is my first GameJam and I really liked the experience!

There is a bug that prevents the display of the 10th Fact so : 

The 10th Fact : Very early in the history of modern humankind people found out that vegetables are not only good for nutrition, but also as powerful sources of health. Their medicinal properties increased their value thousand fold, ensuring their continuing growth and expansion across the entire world.

15/11/2020 : 18h00 : Slowed down the wallpaper.

Art made by https://twitter.com/AoiDesco.
